#summary Content related to the WebDAV (Web-based Distributed Authoring and Versioning) HTTP extensions

==Interpreting the Examples==
*Colour Codes:*
||<b>Client-Side</b>||<b>Server-Side</b>||
||<font color="green">{{{Green}}}</font>||<font color="orange">{{{Orange}}}||

==Example Exchanges==
===Apache 2.2.x and CaDAVer 0.23.2/libneon 0.28.3===
The version used for these examples is {{{Apache/2.2.11 (Fedora) DAV/2 PHP/5.2.9 mod_python/3.3.1 Python/2.5.2 mod_ssl/2.2.11 OpenSSL/0.9.8g mod_perl/2.0.4 Perl/v5.10.0}}}..

The {{{User-Agent}}} string used for the CaDAVer version in this example is {{{cadaver/0.23.2 neon/0.28.3}}}.

Connecting to the server and listing the empty {{{/}}} directory:

<font color="green">
{{{OPTIONS / HTTP/1.1}}}<br/>
{{{Host: localhost:8008}}}<br/>
{{{User-Agent: cadaver/0.23.2 neon/0.28.3}}}<br/>
{{{Keep-Alive: }}}<br/>
{{{Connection: TE, Keep-Alive}}}<br/>
{{{TE: trailers}}}<br/>
</font>

<font color="orange">
{{{HTTP/1.1 200 OK}}}<br/>
{{{Date: Sat, 11 Jul 2009 12:49:22 GMT}}}<br/>
{{{Server: Apache/2.2.11 (Fedora) DAV/2 PHP/5.2.9 mod_python/3.3.1 Python/2.5.2 mod_ssl/2.2.11 OpenSSL/0.9.8g mod_perl/2.0.4 Perl/v5.10.0}}}<br/>
{{{DAV: 1,2}}}<br/>
{{{DAV: <http://apache.org/dav/propset/fs/1>}}}<br/>
{{{MS-Author-Via: DAV}}}<br/>
{{{Allow: OPTIONS,GET,HEAD,POST,DELETE,TRACE,PROPFIND,PROPPATCH,COPY,MOVE,LOCK,UNLOCK}}}<br/>
{{{Content-Length: 0}}}<br/>
{{{Keep-Alive: timeout=15, max=100}}}<br/>
{{{Connection: Keep-Alive}}}<br/>
{{{Content-Type: httpd/unix-directory}}}
</font>

<font color="green">
{{{PROPFIND / HTTP/1.1}}}
{{{Host: localhost:8008}}}
{{{User-Agent: cadaver/0.23.2 neon/0.28.3}}}
{{{Connection: TE}}}
{{{TE: trailers}}}
{{{Depth: 0}}}
{{{Content-Length: 288}}}
{{{Content-Type: application/xml}}}
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<propfind xmlns="DAV:"><prop>
<getcontentlength xmlns="DAV:"/>
<getlastmodified xmlns="DAV:"/>
<executable xmlns="http://apache.org/dav/props/"/>
<resourcetype xmlns="DAV:"/>
<checked-in xmlns="DAV:"/>
<checked-out xmlns="DAV:"/>
</prop></propfind>
